passages.text:
**clock
Eon is waiting at the train station. @eon_idle_ox
It seems like there is no one else around.
[[Ox|Chills]]
passages.name: Station

passages.text:
**footsteps
She looks towards the sound. @sfx_footsteps 
@eon_lookAround_ox
A silhouette is approaching her. 
She turns her head away. 
Stranger doesn't stop. 
Footsteps coming closer. 
[[Stranger]]
passages.name: Footsteps

passages.text:
**stranger
She looks again towards the stranger. @eon_anxious_ox
A silhouette wearing a dark jacket, jeans and sneakers.
Eon:<color="blue"> "Okay, casual style."</color>
Stranger keeps walking towards her. @sfx_footsteps
She looks away.
[[Hello stranger]]
passages.name: Stranger

passages.text:
**dialog
The footsteps stops next to her. @sfx_footsteps @eon_anxious_ox
With the corner of her eye, she sees the torn out sneakers and the jeans.
The stranger sits down next to her.
Stranger: <color="red">"Hello stranger."</color>
[[Eagle|Hello]]
[[Ox|Get Away]]
passages.name: Hello stranger

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon: <color="blue">"Hello? Can I help you?"</color> @eon_anxious_eagle
Stranger: <color="red">"You can help yourself."</color>
The stranger's alligator smile grows bigger.
[[Eagle|Why]]
[[Ox|Get Away]]
passages.name: Hello

passages.text: **exxQuestion Eon: Why is this dude acting so weird?, Eon thinks. @eon_scared_ox She gets up and walks away without saying anything. [[Ox|Run!]]
passages.name: Get Away

passages.text:
**warning
As she is walking away, she hears their deep voice again.
Stranger:<color="red">"There is no reason to be scared as long as you prove to be sharp."</color> @eon_run_ox
Eon starts running towards the exit. @eon_run_ox
[[Ox|Exit Door]]
passages.name: Run!

passages.text:
**exit
The stranger is suddenly at the exit door. @eon_panic_ox
Stranger:<color="red">"I told you not to be scared."</color>
[[Ox|Run Again]]
[[Lion|Angry]]
passages.name: Exit Door

passages.text:
**exit
Eon runs towards the other exit as fast as she can. @sfx_shortOfBreath @eon_run_ox
[[Ox|Exit Door]]
passages.name: Run Again

passages.text:
**explosion
Eon:<color="blue">"Just fucking let me go!"</color> @eon_angry_lion
Stranger:<color="red">"If I were you, I'd listen to me or there would be consequences."</color>
[[Ox|Run Again]]
[[Lion|What]]
passages.name: Angry

passages.text:
**footsteps
Eon gets chills. 
She doesn't like being alone. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon:<color="blue"> "I wish there was someone waiting with me."</color>
Then she hears footsteps. @sfx_footsteps
[[Footsteps]]
passages.name: Chills

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon:<color="blue">"What the fuck you want?"</color> @eon_unhappy_lion
Stranger:<color="red">"I have a riddle for you."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"What?"</color> @eon_confused_lion
Stranger:<color="red">"A riddle."</color>
[[Human|What Is A Riddle]]
[[Ox|Ready]]
passages.name: What

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon:<color="blue">"But I don't know what riddle means."</color> @eon_confused_human
Stranger looks confused. 
Stranger:<color="red">"Are you from fucking Mars? How do you not know what riddles are?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"I just don't man, sorry..."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"Oh man...Okay, I'll just explain then. It's like a puzzle you solve."</color>
[[Human|Puzzle]]
[[Ox|Run Again]]
passages.name: What Is A Riddle

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon:<color="blue">Okay tell me...</color> @eon_anxious_ox
The Alligator smile grows bigger.
Stranger:<color="red">Okay here it comes...</color>
[[Ox|Riddle]]
passages.name: Ready

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay but what's a puzzle?"</color> @eon_sinister_human
Stranger:<color="red">"What?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"I don't know what that means."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"Are you fucking kidding me?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Why would I do that?"</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"I'll tell you something and you'll try to guess what I mean!"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh okay, it's a guessing game. But..."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"QUIET NOW!"</color>
[[Human|Riddle]]
passages.name: Puzzle

passages.text:
**riddle
Stranger:<color="red">"Yes it is. So here it comes...</color>
Stranger:<color="red">What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone? Take you time because if you fail, there will be consequences."</color>
[[Human|Thinking]]
[[Ox|Just think]]
[[Eagle|Think]]
passages.name: Riddle

passages.text: **think Eon:Hmm, It can be multiple things.@eon_think_human [[Ox|Repeat]] [[Human|STD]] [[Eagle|Word]]
passages.name: Thinking

passages.text:
**notAllowed
Eon:<color="blue">"Wait a minute! That's just cheating man, not cool. It is my turn to ask you one now!"</color> @eon_sinister_human
Stranger:<color="red">"Your?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Yes, it's your turn to guess now."</color>
[[Human|Your turn]]
passages.name: Cheating

passages.text: **love Eon is thinking. @eon_anxious_ox But it is quite hard cause she is hella pressed. Eon:What is something that you get to keep after giving it?... Eon: Eon says with a very low voice,"I'm sorry, do you mind repeating the riddle again?" [[Ox|Love]]
passages.name: Repeat

passages.text:
**love
Stranges looks disappointed. He repeats rolling his eyes,
Stranger:<color="red">"What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Yes yes. I just need to think a little.</color> @eon_think_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"It sounds like, hmm, love probably. You gotta have love to be able to give it someone. The more you give, the more you have? I mean, that's what they say..."</color>
[[Ox|One more]]
[[Human|STD]]
passages.name: Love

passages.text: **love Eon: But what if it is not? There will be consequences he said. @eon_think_ox The Stranger is playing with his phone. He looks impatient tapping on the floor with this foot. Eon:What can the consequence be? she asks herself. I guess something bad. It seems like the stranger is just checking his messages. Eon:He looks like a normal person. But this is definitely not a normal situation or act. Stranger:"Ehem! You still there? It's getting late." Eon:"Yes, just one more minute!" [[Ox|Answer Love]]
passages.name: One more

passages.text: **love Eon:It has to be love, or at least nothing else comes to mind. @eon_anxious_ox Eon takes a deep breath. And then hesitantly, she speaks her answer. Eon:"Okay, my guess is that it's love." [[Ox|Love sucks]]
passages.name: Answer Love

passages.text:
**think
Eon feels the tension rising. What kind of consequences she asks with a whisper. @eon_anxious_ox
It is useless to discuss it at this point. Just think.
[[Ox|Repeat]]
passages.name: Just think

passages.text:
**questionMark
Eon:<color="blue">"What is it that given one, you'll have either two or none?"</color> @eon_talk_human
Stranger looks extremly bitter. No more smile.
Eon:<color="blue">"Think carefully"</color>, Eon adds. <color="blue">"Remember, there will be consequences."</color>
[[Human|Slowly]]
passages.name: Your turn

passages.text:
**exit
The alligator face is murmuring. 
Stranger:<color="red">"This must be contemporary one..."</color>
Eon walks to the Exit door slowly. @eon_walkSlow_human
[[Human|Fool]]
passages.name: Slowly

passages.text:
**warning
The moment she steps by the door step, sirens break out. @eon_scared_human
Alligator dude turns towards Eon. His eyes are burning flames. He looks scary.
Stranger:<color="red">"YOU THINK YOU CAN FOOL ME? ME?"</color>
He starts floating towards her. 
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh shit..."</color>
[[Ox|Begging]]
[[Eagle|Calm down]]
passages.name: Fool

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon:<color="blue">"Please calm down, we can figure this out."</color> @eon_anxious_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"NO! YOU THINK I AM STUPID?</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Not at all! Look, you seem mighty and I was scared okay?"</color>
Stranger seems calmer.
Eon:<color="blue">"Sorry I did something stupid. But everyone acts stupid sometimes, right?"</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"Okay, okay. No worries kid. Well, then we'll skip your riddle and move on to consequences."</color>
[[Eagle|Consequences]]
passages.name: Calm down

passages.text: **std Eon is thinking. @eon_think_human Eon:I feel like STD's fits this definition perfectly. You still keep them after you give it to someone. Dang... [[Human|Guess STD]] [[Ox|Repeat]] [[Eagle|Word]]
passages.name: STD

passages.text:
**thumbDown
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay, I think it's STD's!"</color> @eon_think_human
The stranger looks surprised. 
Stranger:<color="red">"Ehmm..."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"What? You give them and still keep them."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"I guess that's true...but that was not the answer I expected. So, I'll ask another now."</color>
[[Human|Cheating]]
passages.name: Guess STD

passages.text:
**thumbDown
Stranger:<color="red">"Oooh, aren't you a sweetheart, it almost breaks my heart.</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"But that's just not true. You can totally love and then open up to someone. And lose it afterwards because they are actually a piece of shit!"</color> @eon_surprised_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"Argh, sounds like you have some shit going on."</color>
[[Ox|Consequences]]
passages.name: Love sucks

passages.text:
**eyes
Eon is shaking. Holy shit, what's gonna happen now? @eon_panic_ox
Then she hears speakers turned on. 
<color="red">"TO GET OUT YOU GOTTA EAT THE WHOLE EXIT DOOR. DON'T TRY TO CHEAT, IT WON'T WORK."</color>
Eon looks back in confusion.
[[Ox|Unexpected]]
[[Eagle|Waiting]]
passages.name: Announcements

passages.text:
**turnip
And that's not what she expected.@eon_surprised_ox
She sees a giant turnip covering the exit door.
Eon:<color="blue">"Holy shit, that's definitely a surprise."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"AND IT'S A BITTER ONE. HAHAHA."</color>
[[Ox|Bitter]]
passages.name: Unexpected

passages.text: **turnip Eon:Okay, I can eat turnip. Whatever. She bites the turnip. @eon_eat_ox @sfx_bite Eon:It is hard, and bitter just like he said. [[Ox |Bloathing]]
passages.name: Bitter

passages.text:
**turnip
As Eon keeps eating it, her chewing get slower and slower. @eon_eat_ox
She feels her stomach bloathing.
Stranger:<color="red">"Yesss!!! Keep on going! You can do it!!!"</color>
[[Ox|Eating]]
passages.name: Bloathing

passages.text: **turnip Eon:"This is really stupid. I am not trying to get out. I'm waiting to get on my train!"@eon_think_eagle I should just pretend to eat it until my train arrives, which can be any minute. @eon_eat_eagle Stranger:"GO AHEAD!" Stranger keeps talking. [[Eagle|Small bite]]
passages.name: Waiting

passages.text:
**turnip
Eon takes a very small bite of the turnip. 
Stranger:<color="red">"WOW YOU ARE A SLOW EATER"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"I am so full, I think I need a break."</color> @eon_tired_eagle
[[Eagle|Train]]
passages.name: Small bite

passages.text:
**eyes
As she hears the train approaching, she gets back to eating again. @eon_eat_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"GOTTA EAT FASTER!"</color>
[[Eagle|Train here]]
passages.name: Train

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon: <color="blue">"Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want?"</color>@eon_confused_eagle
Stranger: <color="red">"I have a riddle for you. I want you to make a guess. If you guess right, you'll be fine. If not, there will be...</color>
Stranger: <color="red">consequences."</color>
[[Eagle|Surprise]]
[[Ox|Get Away]]
[[Human|What Is A Riddle]]
passages.name: Why

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon:<color="blue">"What if I say no?"</color> @eon_think_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"Then you'll lose by default and face the consequences."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"And what are those?"</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"I cannot tell, that's a surprise."</color>
[[Ox|Ready]]
[[Human|What Is A Riddle]]
[[Eagle|Who]]
[[Lion|What]]
passages.name: Surprise

passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon:<color="blue">"And may I ask who you are?"</color> @eon_confused_eagle
Strangers smile grows deeper.
Stranger:<color="red">"I am the riddle master. I am ancient."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"I think I know who you are."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"Is that so? Then tell me my name!"</color>
[[Eagle|Syphinx]]
passages.name: Who

passages.text:
**syphinx
Eon:<color="blue">"I believe you are Syphinx, master of riddles and father of terror."</color>@eon_think_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"I have to admit, no one called me by that in a very long time. You impressed me girl."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"And I guess you'll eat me if I guess incorrectly?"</color>@eon_anxious_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"No, not anymore. I developed reflux over the years. But I have other methods of terror. Anyway, as you know by now there is no other option for you to answer my riddle. Are you ready?"</color>
[[Eagle|My Name]]
passages.name: Syphinx

passages.text:
**think
Eon:<color="blue">"Interesting... Multiple things come to mind."</color>@eon_think_eagle
[[Ox|Repeat]]
[[Human|STD]]
[[Eagle|Word]]
passages.name: Think

passages.text: **word Eon is thinking. @eon_think_eagle Eon:It can be an advice or word, but technically you don't need to keep any of those after giving them. [[Human|STD]] [[Ox|Repeat]] [[Eagle|More words]]
passages.name: Word

passages.text: Eon:This dude must be super old. It makes sense that it's a lame word play. @eon_think_eagle Eon:Words are expected to be kept. I don't think that's true for advice. Eon:I'll go for word, that makes the most sense. And he won't be eating me anyway. [[Eagle|Guess words]]
passages.name: More words

passages.text:
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay, here I go. Answer to you riddle is, I believe, word. When you give your word to someone, you get to keep it!"</color> @eon_anxious_eagle
The Stranger smiles wide.
[[Eagle|Thank you]]
passages.name: Guess words

passages.text:
Stranger:<color="red">"I am impressed my friend. Really impressed."</color>@eon_happy_eagle
The train is approaching the station finally. @sfx_train
Stranger:<color="red">"You are free to go now. It was a pleasure to challenge you my friend."</color>
[[Eagle|Train Arrives]]
passages.name: Thank you

passages.text:
**blueOrange
~~
Stranger:<color="red">"Thank you for remembering my name. Not many people do anymore. I'd like to present you this rare blue flower as a gift."</color>
Eon picks the blue orange. @eon_approve_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"Now, it is time for the riddle..."</color>
[[Eagle|Riddle]]
passages.name: My Name

passages.text:
**thumbDown
Stranger:<color="red">"Anyway, you failed! You'll face the consequences."</color>@eon_anxious_ox
And the stranger disappears, boom!
[[Ox|Announcements]]
passages.name: Consequences

passages.text:
**fire
As the doors open, she feels a very intense heat coming from inside. @eon_surprised_eagle
The train is on fire. And full of Turnips. The turnips are screaming, "HELP! HELP IT IS SO HOT IN HERE!"
Eon: <color="blue">"What the fuck..."</color>
"PLEASE! WE SHOULDN'T BE ROASTED," yelped the turnips.
STranger:<color="red">"Hmm, my favorite."</color>
[[Eagle|No train]]
passages.name: Full

passages.text:
**turnip
Stranger:<color="red">"As you see, it's a turnip hell. So, I'd advise not to get on."</color> @eon_scared_eagle
The train takes off with the screaming turnips.
Eon is silent. 
Stranger:<color="red">"So, is your stomach ready yet?"</color>
[[Ox|Unexpected]]
passages.name: No train

passages.text:
**turnip
The train stops. Eon hears screams coming from inside. @eon_panic_ox
As the doors open, she feels a very intense heat coming from inside.
The train is on fire. And full of screaming turnips. 
"HELP! HELP IT IS SO HOT IN HERE!" the turnips scream.
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh my God, oh my God, OH MY GOD!"</color>
"PLEASE!" the turnips continue to yell, "WE ARE GETTING ROASTED. AND WE ARE TURNIPS!"
Stranger:<color="red">"Hmm, delicious!</color>
[[Ox|Last Chance]]
passages.name: Turnip Hell

passages.text:
**cry
Eon:<color="blue">"Please mister, please! I'll do anything. Please!"</color>@eon_panic_ox
Stranger:<color="red">"Well, you have to be more convincing."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Well I'm not a turnip in the first place."</color>
The turnips start to scream, "ARGHHH!!!! OUCH!!!"
Stranger:<color="red">"Okay, one last chance for you then, but you need to do as I say."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Anything sir. Anything!"</color>
The train takes off.
[[Ox|Your task]]
passages.name: Last Chance

passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Eon is shaking. Holy shit, what's gonna happen now?  @eon_panic_ox
Then she hears speakers turned on. 
Stranger:<color="red">"TO GET OUT YOU GOTTA EAT THE WHOLE EXIT DOOR. DON'T TRY TO CHEAT, IT WON'T WORK."</color>
Eon looks back in confusion. 
[[Ox|Unexpected]]
passages.name: Your task

passages.text:
**turnip
Eon keep eating.@eon_eat_ox
Eating.
Eating.
Eating.
Eating.
Eating.
For hours.
[[Ox|Last bite]]
passages.name: Eating

passages.text:
**tick
And finally it is the last bite. @eon_tired_ox
As she is chewing, she feels her stomach is on fire.
She feels nauseous. 
Stranger:<color="red">"You did it girl! Congratulations!"</color>
[[Ox|Vomit]]
passages.name: Last bite

passages.text:
**explosion
Eon starts to vomit. Everywhere. @eon_vomit_ox
Stranger:<color="red">"Arghh, this doesn't look good."</color>
She vomits through the door, on the floor, all over herself.
Stranger:<color="red">"Okay, help is on the way!"</color>
Ambulance sirens are coming from the railway.
[[Ox|Ambulance]]
passages.name: Vomit

passages.text:
**medPlus
Eon passes out vomiting as the ambulance train arrives. @eon_passedOut_ox
2 turnips come out carrying a stretcher.
Stranger:<color="red">"Hi Danny, hi Bo! Thank you for coming so fast."</color>
They seem annoyed. They lift off Eon and put her on the stretcher.
"Man...You really need to reconsider you way of interacting with people. This can't go on like this," complains Danny.
Stranger:<color="red">"You know, I am ancient. It is not easy to change habits. Still, sorry for the mess. "</color>
Turnips just sigh.
[[Ox|End]]
passages.name: Ambulance

passages.text:
**end
"We'll make sure she makes safely to home," says Danny. @eon_passedOut_ox
Stranger:<color="red">"Thank you Danny! Bo! See you next time!"</color>
As the train takes off Stranger speaks to himself silently.
Stranger:<color="red">"One day, I'll find someone who likes turnips as much as I do. And it is close. I feel it in my bones."</color>
@end
passages.name: End

passages.text:
The train arrives.  @eon_hi_eagle
Eon:<color="blue">"This was the longest wait I ever had."</color>
She jumps on the train. 
Stranger:<color="red">"Take care my friend!"</color>
Eon waves at the stranger as the train took off. @end
passages.name: Train Arrives

passages.text:
**cry
Eon:<color="blue">"NO!NO! PLEASE DON'T HURT ME!"</color>@eon_panic_ox
Stranger:<color="red">"SHOULD I SEND YOU TO TURNIP HELL? SHOULD I?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh God, oh God. Please mister, please forgive me. Please..."</color>
Stranger:<color="red">"I'LL SHOW YOU NOW..."</color>
The train approaches the station.
[[Ox|Turnip Hell]]
passages.name: Begging

passages.text:
**dialog
Train arrives at the station finally.
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay, sorry but I need to go. I am late."</color> @eon_walk_eagle
Stranger:<color="red">"WHAT? Where do you think you are going?"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"To home! I gotta get up early tomorrow."</color>
She calmly walks toward the train. 
[[Eagle|Full]]
passages.name: Train here
